name: Wandering in Rambley Valley
description:
An exploration game in which you can wander around and listen to the stories of everyone in the town. This was project undertaken to learn unity audio systems and as an excuse to compose some music for a game :)

BIG thanks to my very good friends who lent their voices and skills to help make this project fun and fulfilling!
